TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridCheckBoxColumn extends System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn

summary.span: 表示一个 列，该列在其单元格中承载 控件。

span.span: Represents a column that hosts controls in its cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 以将布尔数据的列显示为 。Use to display columns of Boolean data as a . 下图显示的示例 。The following illustration shows an example of . ![一个 DataGridCheckBox 列](~/add/media/wpf-datagrid-checkbox.png "一个 DataGridCheckBox 列")![A DataGridCheckBox column](~/add/media/wpf-datagrid-checkbox.png "A DataGridCheckBox column") 若要填充列，请使用属性将列绑定到数据 。To populate the column, bind the column to the data by using the property. 属性应用于 在列中创建的元素。The property is applied to the element created in the column. 每个单元中的元素的是单元格所在行的数据项。The for the element in each cell is the data item for the row the cell is in. 因此，若要设置绑定，只需设置 。Therefore, to set up the binding you only have to set the . 如果你的数据源和目标为不同的类型，则可以选择指定。Optionally, you can specify a if your data source and target are different types. 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅 [ (WPF) 的数据绑定 ](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf)。For more information about data binding, see [Data Binding (WPF)](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf). 可以 通过设置属性（如、、和）来自定义 。You can customize the by setting properties, such as , , , and . 如果要显示其他类型的数据，则 提供以下列类型：If you want to display other types of data, provides the following column types: |列类型Column Type|数据显示Data Display| |-----------------|------------------| ||用于显示 URI 数据。Use to display URI data.| ||用于显示枚举数据。Use to display enumeration data.| ||用于显示文本。Use to display text.| 如果要使用中的其他控件 ，则可以使用创建自己的列类型 。If you want to use other controls in your , you can create your own column types by using . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何添加 。The following example shows how to add a . 此示例使用数据库作为源，并显示布尔数据的列。This example uses a database as the source and displays a column of Boolean data. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_CheckBoxColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_checkboxcolumn/CS/window1.xaml#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示所承载的 控件是支持三种状态还是两种状态。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the hosted controls enable three states or two.

value.span: 如果承载的控件支持三种状态，则为 ；如果它们支持两种状态，则为 。

span.span: if the hosted controls support three states; if they support two states.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你使用可以为 null 的布尔值作为数据类型，并且具有与属性相同的功能 。The property lets you use a nullable Boolean as the data type and has the same functionality as the property on . 控件的属性的三个状态 分别为 `true` 、 `false` 和 `null` 。The three states for the property of the control are `true`, `false`, and `null`.

param.name: editingElement
param.span: 列为处于编辑模式的单元格显示的元素。

span.span: The element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.

param.name: editingEventArgs
param.span: 有关导致单元格进入编辑模式的用户笔势的信息。

span.span: Information about the user gesture that is causing a cell to enter editing mode.

summary.span: 当列中的单元格进入编辑模式时调用。

span.span: Called when a cell in the column enters editing mode.
The unedited value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当派生自的列中的单元格进入编辑模式时，控件将调用方法 。The control calls the method when a cell in a column derived from enters editing mode. 类将重写此方法，以通过更新寄宿控件中的值来立即响应用户手势 。The class overrides this method to respond immediately to the user gesture by updating the value in the hosted control. 这种立即响应是必需的，因为 单元格进入编辑模式时，其用户笔势更改了其所承载的状态 。This immediate response is necessary because a cell enters edit mode with the same user gesture that changes the state of its hosted .
